name: Hotel Saint Jean

reviews.text: I trusted the reviews here and I was glad I did! The reception was extremely friendly and helpful, the rooms were recently renovated, the bed was extremely comfortable with high quality sheets, and the location was quiet and convenient to both downtown and the train station (10 min walk to either one). Plus it was a great value! BE AWARE that the hotel closes between 12 and 5 pm, so contact the hotel ahead of time if you are going to be arriving then!!
reviews.title: Excellent all-around!

reviews.text: Almost in the centre of town the rooms are small but spotless. the tariff is reasonable and the proprietors are exceedingly helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Excellent for the tourist or traveller

description: Quiet hotel, in front of swamp, 5min walking of the historic town center of Bourges and 10min of the train station
